of new department with regards to client implementation which resulted in a seamless transition to software upgrade Escalated and resolved customers issues and complaints on operational matters Assisted the manager in recruiting diligent professionals dedicated to high values of service and performance Designed and coordinated in developing proper training programs for the employees of the
